noun.description: An action that is performed intentionally or consciously.
A legal document that is signed and delivered, especially one regarding the ownership of property or legal rights.

verb.description: Convey or transfer (property or rights) by legal deed.
examples: they deeded their property to their children

origin: Old English dēd, dǣd, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch daad and German Tat, from an Indo-European root shared by do.
